comment: This is disgusting . I m so mad , and I m not giving a dime to the Razorback Foundation until this guy is out . Maybe that doesn t mean much , but integrity matters , and there s no way he didn t know . <URL>

comment: It amazes me how some people think that they are the moral compass of the world and how they play judge and jury when they have no clue about the actual facts . You have no idea what actually went down yet you are ready to accuse this young man on rumors , not facts . Go away .
